text: Margaret Bryan is a retired British diplomat. She served as Ambassador to Panama from 1986 until 1989. Bryan had been appointed Consul at Kinshasa on 31 March 1980. ==Personal life== Bryan was the daughter of James Grant and Dorothy Rebecca Galloway. She married Peter Bernard Bryan in 1952. Their marriage was dissolved in 1981. == References == Category:Companions of the Order of St Michael and St George Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Panama Category:British women ambassadors Category:Living people Category:1929 births
title: Margaret Bryan (diplomat)
